section_title:
10b00 - Employment relationship required for FLSA to
apply.
text:
In order for
the FLSA to apply there must be an employee-employer relationship. This
requires an “employer” and “employee” and the act or condition of employment.
FLSA Secs 3(d), (e) and (g) define the terms “employer”, “employee”, and
“employ”.
html: In order for the FLSA to apply there must be an employee-employer relationship. This requires an “employer” and “employee” and the act or condition of employment. FLSA Secs 3(d), (e) and (g) define the terms “employer”, “employee”, and “employ”.
